Posts.Content: I just found out i have breast cancer,what?? I am still in shock~a bad nightmare!! Now with that said, i am a fighter and want all the right information i can absorb!! I have one opinion now i am going to get another.i am going to dr.burzynski   in houston tomorrow by choice. I have only heard good things. Anyone have feed back for me on this??
Posts.Title: I Just Found Out I Have Breast Cancer!
